类 SettingsText

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.menu.settingpage.SettingsText
所有已实现的接口:
Drawable
public class SettingsText extends Object implements Drawable
The SettingsText class handles the rendering and management of text and its boundaries in the settings menu. It dynamically updates text content and boundaries based on the current page. Implements Drawable.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    SettingsText()
    Constructs a SettingsText object and initializes the visual boundaries and text properties.

    Configures the appearance of the specified verdict text and boundary.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • SettingsText

      public SettingsText()
      Constructs a SettingsText object and initializes the visual boundaries and text properties.

  • 方法详细资料

    • setBoundAndVerdict

      public void setBoundAndVerdict(BoundedString verdict, CRect bound)
      Configures the appearance of the specified verdict text and boundary.
      参数:
      verdict - the BoundedString to be configured
      bound - the CRect boundary to be configured

    • updateText

      public void updateText()
      Updates the content of the text fields based on the current settings page. - Page 1: Displays hints-related text. - Page 2: Displays time-related text.

    • render

      public void render(Graphics2D g2d)
      Renders the text and its associated boundaries to the screen. Adjusts the header text based on the current page.
      指定者:
      render 在接口中 Drawable
      参数:
      g2d - the Graphics2D object used for rendering
